# Next.js Excel Processing Project

## Project Overview
This is a Next.js application that allows users to:
- Upload Excel files
- Select a specific sheet from the uploaded file
- Choose columns for comparison
- Process the data to remove duplicate/similar rows
- Return unique JSON objects

## Technology Stack
- Next.js with TypeScript
- React for UI components
- xlsx library for Excel file processing
- API routes for backend processing

## Development Instructions
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
- Keep components modular and reusable
